description: Collaborative intelligence support language is a common language to support analysts to perform their analysis to get crowdsourced support when using threat intelligence sharing platform like MISP. The objective of this language is to advance collaborative analysis and to share earlier than later.

predicates.description: Request predicate covers all the requests which can be done by analysts or organisations willing to get additional information to support their analysis.

entry.expanded: Request a deobfuscated sample of the shared sample
Request additional samples compared to the original analysis to build a competitive analysis on the reversing aspect
Request related samples required for further analysis
Request additional static analysis or reversing on the information shared
Request an abuse contact to report to
Request about the target(s) including field of activities or companies
Request further technical or tactical analysis
